src:
Man City Disebut Mirip Frankenstein, Mustahil Ikonik Seperti Real Madrid dan MU
06 Nov 2019, 13:27 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Pandit sepak bola Inggris, Simon Jordan, mengatakan Manchester City akan sulit menyamai level ikonik Real Madrid dan Manchester United. Walaupun ke depan Man City akan memenangkan banyak gelar juara.
Man City menjadi tim papan atas pasca mendapat investasi besar. Man City menjelma sebagai tim yang rajin mengeluarkan banyak uang di bursa transfer. Man City dihuni banyak pemain bintang.
Dua musim terakhir, Man City tampil sangat perkasa di Premier League. Di bawah kendali Pep Guardiola, bukan hanya gelar juara yang diraih, Man City juga dikenal sebagai tim yang mengusung sepak bola indah.
Man City juga terus membangun tim untuk bisa berjaya di pentas Eropa. Capaian Sergio Aguero dan kolega di Liga Champions terus membaik, meski sejauh ini belum ada gelar juara di pentas Liga Champions.
text:
Man City Called Like Frankenstein, Impossible Iconic Like Real Madrid and MU
Nov 6 2019, 13:27 by Bola.net
Soccer - British soccer pandit Simon Jordan says Manchester City will find it difficult to match the iconic levels of Real Madrid and Manchester United. Although in the future Man City will win many titles.
Man City became the top team after receiving a large investment. Man City was incarnated as a team that diligently spent a lot of money in the transfer market. Man City is home to many star players.
The last two seasons, Man City appear very powerful in the Premier League. Under Pep Guardiola's control, not only is the title won, Man City is also known as a team that carries beautiful football.
Man City also continues to build teams to be victorious on the European stage. The achievements of Sergio Aguero and colleagues in the Champions League continue to improve, although so far there has been no championship title on the Champions League stage.
